title: COUNTRY
description:
The COUNTRY object is based on the ISO 3166-1 Standard. Boehringer internal extensions are accepted if absolutely needed.
A country is a political entity with clear geographic boundaries and sovereignity over the territory and the people within. The boundaries are mostly internationally recognized and within them, economic and social activities are under control of the Legislation, Jurisdiction and Executive Power of the country. 
Link: https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search

id.title: referenceDataId
id.description: The Reference Data ID is the (technical) Identifier of all REFERNCE DATA maintained in the Reference Data Management System.

name.title: name
name.description:
The term is the human readable unique name typically used in drop down menus of applications. 
In cases when the complete name is too long, then a meaningful abbreviation is created for the term.
English is the leading Language.

shortDescription.title: shortDescription
shortDescription.description:
The Short Description is the human readable unique and complete name. In cases when the complete name fits into the Short Description then it is identical to the Long Description.
English is the leading Language.

longDescription.title: longDescription
longDescription.description:
The description provides all information needed for business to understand the meaning of the provided term. 
English is the leading Language.

lastChangeDate.title: lastChangeDate
lastChangeDate.description: Last Change Date is the timestamp when any value of the reference data record has been changed or created.

lastChangingUser.title: lastChangingUser
lastChangingUser.description: Last Changing User is the last Boehringer employee or external person that changed or created the reference data record in the system.

sourcesRefIds.title: sourceOfInformation
sourcesRefIds.description:
SOURCE OF INFORMATION describes who defined specific Reference Data.
The Source can be an external or internal standard.

iso3Code.title: alpha-3Code
iso3Code.description: The Alpha-3 code according to ISO 3166-1

sapCode.title: sapCode
sapCode.description: The SAP Code is the unique identifier from SAP to identity the data record.

countryCallingCode.title: countryCallingCode
countryCallingCode.description: Country calling codes or country dial in codes are telephone dialing prefixes for the member countries or regions of the International Telecommunication Union (ITU). They are defined by the ITU-T in standards E.123 and E.164. The prefixes enable international direct dialing (IDD), and are also referred to as international subscriber dialing (ISD) codes.

englishShortName.title: englishShortName
englishShortName.description: English short name according to ISO 3166-1

numericCode.title: numericCode
numericCode.description: The numeric code of a COUNTRY according to ISO 3166-1

rmsStatus.title: rmsStatus
rmsStatus.description: Status of the EMA RMS Identifier.

countrySubdivisionsRefIds.title: countrySubdivisions
countrySubdivisionsRefIds.description: The SUBDIVISION of a COUNTRY according to ISO 3166-2.

languagesRefIds.title: languages
languagesRefIds.description:
Language definitions are based on ISO 639-1.
ISO 639-1 contains much other information about the use of language symbols and registration of new symbols.
The language codes of ISO 639-1 are said to be "devised primarily for use in terminology, lexicograph

currenciesRefIds.title: currencies
currenciesRefIds.description: The CURRENCY is defined according to the ISO 4217 standard. In general it reprensents the local currency of a country and is allocated on legal entity level.

items.title: referenceDataId

regulatoryRegionsRefIds.title: regulatoryRegions
regulatoryRegionsRefIds.description:
REGULATORY REGION is a specific kind of COUNTRY GROUPING with the COUNTRY GROUPING TYPE "Regulatory Region".
It is a specific kind of REGIONAL GROUPING to group together the COUNTRYs of the WORLD from a regulatory perspective.
